input.sentences: we were on the street and saw these masks .
then we saw this pretty mask .
output.sentences: People were out and about on the street wearing masks for the parade.
People in pretty clothes or a mask stayed away from the waters.
A scary guy lead the parade of people away from the waterfall.
We even saw beautiful women wearing skimpy costumes.
Those women had made those costumes earlier in the month just for this event.
